text:
If
an employer directs an employee, or any group of employees, to work beyond the
regularly scheduled workshift the “normal workday” of such employee, or group
of employees, has been extended, and the same principle in IB 785.43 applies
html: If an employer directs an employee, or any group of employees, to work beyond the regularly scheduled workshift the “normal workday” of such employee, or group of employees, has been extended, and the same principle in IB 785.43 applies
